Package org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AndroidNfcPlugin
    The PcscPlugin interface provides the public elements used to manage the Android OMAPI plugin.
    AndroidNfcReader
    SeReader to communicate with NFC Tag though Android NfcAdapter Configure NFCAdapter Protocols with AndroidNfcReaderImpl.setParameter(String, String) Optimized for android 4.4 (API 19) to 6.0 (API 23)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidNfcFragment
    Add this Fragment to the Android application Activity Fragment#onCreate(Bundle) method to enable NFC getFragmentManager().beginTransaction() .add(AndroidNfcFragment.newInstance(), "myFragmentId").commit(); By default the plugin only listens to events when your application activity is in the foreground.
    AndroidNfcPluginFactory  
    AndroidNfcProtocolSettings
    This class contains all the parameters to identify the communication protocols supported by NFC readers.
